attributes.action: Exemption of the Covid-19 Vaccine for people with deeply held Religous Faiths
attributes.additional_details: It is every human beings right on the basis of their faith, whom belong to a Government of a Higher Authority than any Earthly government to refuse the Covid-19 vaccine without any 'Consequences'. Therefore showing whom the individual serves based on their faith and pledging their allegience to our Creator. I hereby request this Exemption and Refusal of the Covid-19 vaccine to apply to all people, parents and their children residing in the UK, on the basis of the firm foundation of their Faith.
attributes.background: The UK Goverment should NOT make the Covid-19 Vaccination Mandatory or in 'written Law', therefore allowing Exemptions for ALL citizens to refuse the Covid-19 vaccination on the basis of a persons individual religous faith.

rejection.details:
It is already against the law for people to be required to undergo medical treatment, including vaccinations. The Coronavirus Act 2020 has not changed this.

You might like to sign this related petition:

Prevent any restrictions on those who refuse a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323442
